items.title: Transfer rumors, news: Man City prepare Guehi offer, won't meet £35m asking price
items.description: Manchester City are readying an offer for Marc Guéhi, and N'Golo Kanté is close to a return to Europe. Transfer Talk has the latest.

items.title: Tomlin steps down; not expected to coach in '26
items.description: Mike Tomlin has stepped down as Steelers coach, ending a 19-year run in Pittsburgh during which he never had a losing season.

items.title: 'Elite' Peterson, KU hand No. 2 Iowa St. 1st loss
